title: Fruit and Nut Raita
ingredients: ['750g plain natural yoghurt', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '1/3 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons raisins, soaked in boiling water for 20 minutes and drained', '2 tablespoons salted cashew nuts, chopped', '1 tablespoon flaked almonds', '1 tablespoon shelled and chopped salted pistachio nuts']
